articles.author: Jon Porter, Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Apple hit with first ever EU fine following Spotify complaint - The Verge
articles.description: Apple has been fined by European Union antitrust regulators and told to allow developers to link users out to their own websites to sign up for their services.
articles.content:
Apple hit with first-ever EU fine following Spotify complaint
Apple hit with first-ever EU fine following Spotify complaint
